summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeGive BackThe Super Cuties Trial Kit contains six face-changing Bubble minis. Together they form a refreshing, barrier-boosting routine that‚Äôll help you face the day at home or on-the-go!
details: DetailsBenefitsDeveloped with dermatologists.Helps support a healthy skin barrier.Promotes a calm, balanced, and hydrated complexion.Key IngredientsHyaluronic Acid helps your skin attract and retain moisture.Plant Based Ceramides help replenish the natural building blocks of your skin barrier.Green Tea Extract helps calm and soothe skin, plus protect it from environmental stressors.Lavender Flower Water helps calm, purify, and soothe skin.Avocado Oil helps nourish dry skin, reduce redness, soften, and moisturize.IncludesFresh Start Gel Cleanser (0.33 oz)Soft Launch Hydrating Cream Cleanser (0.33 oz)Water Slide Hydration Boosting Serum (0.17 oz)Slam Dunk Hydrating Moisturizer (0.33 oz)Cloud Surf Water Cream Moisturizer (0.33 oz)Morning Rays Brightening Eye Cream (0.10 oz)Travel bagItem 2636991How To UseAM and PM, apply 1-2 pumps of Fresh Start or Soft Launch to wet skin. Rinse off and pat dry. Follow with 1 pump of Water Slide and allow to absorb for one minute. Next, evenly apply 1-2 pumps of Slam Dunk or Cloud Surf. Finish by gently tapping 1-2 pumps of Morning Rays on the undereye area (and top it all off with a Bubble SPF if it's your morning routine).IngredientsFresh Start: Water (Aqua), Disodium Cocoyl Glutamate, Glycerin, Acrylates/Steareth-20 Methacrylate Copolymer, Sodium Cocoyl Glutamate, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Flower Water, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Ascorbic Acid, Butylene Glycol, Caffeine, Citric Acid, Ethylhexylglycerin, Gluconolactone, Hydrolyzed Rhodophyceae Extract, Mentha Viridis (Spearmint) Leaf Extract, Tocopherol, Phenoxyethanol, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Sodium Sulfite.Soft Launch: Water (Aqua), Cocamidopropyl Hydroxysultaine, Polyglyceryl-2 Stearate, Behenyl Alcohol, Polyacrylate Crosspolymer-6, Glycolipids, Glyceryl Stearate, Pentylene Glycol, Sphingomonas Ferment Extract, Allantoin, Ceramide NP, Ceramide AP, Ceramide EOP, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Sodium Phytate, Sodium Lauroyl Lactylate, Polylysine, Phytosphingosine, Cholesterol, Sodium Methyl Cocoyl Taurate, Xanthan Gum, Carbomer, Phenoxyethanol, Stearyl Alcohol, Citric Acid, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Polyglyceryl-6 Dicaprate, Ethylhexylglycerin.Water Slide: Water (Aqua), Propanediol, Glycerin, Squalane, Saccharide Isomerate, Niacinamide, Capryloyl Glycerin/Sebacic Acid Copolymer, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Anastatica Hierochuntica Extract, Beta-Sitosterol, Butyrospermum Parkii Butter, Ceramide NG, Ceramide NP, Cetearyl Olivate, Cetyl Alcohol, Citric Acid, Diheptyl Succinate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Cera, Gluconolactone, Glyceryl Acrylate/Acrylic Acid Copolymer, Glyceryl Behenate, Lactic Acid, Lauryl Glucoside, Lecithin, Oleic Acid, Opuntia Ficus-Indica Seed Oil, Palmitoyl Tetrapeptide-7, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Pentylene Glycol, Phytic Acid, Polyglyceryl 4 Isostearate, Potassium Hydroxide, Sodium Citrate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, Sodium Lactate, Sorbitan Olivate, Sucrose, Tocopherol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Tremella Fuciformis (Mushroom) Extract, Xanthan Gum, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Benzoate.Slam Dunk: Water (Aqua), Isononyl Isononanoate, Glycerin, Heptyl Undecylenate, Glyceryl Stearate Citrate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Polyglyceryl-3 Stearate, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice Powder, Anthemis Nobilis Flower Extract, Arginine, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Cetyl Alcohol, Glucose, Hoya Lacunosa Flower Extract, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Hydrolyzed Pea Protein, Oenothera Biennis (Evening Primrose) Oil, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Phytate, Sodium Succinate, Tocopherol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Phenoxyethanol.Cloud Surf: Water (Aqua), Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Glycerin, Cetyl Ethylhexanoate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Butylene Glycol, Glyceryl Stearate, Isododecane, 1,2-Hexanediol, Apium Graveolens (Celery) Seed Extract, Biosaccharide Gum-4, Citric Acid, Ethylhexylglycerin, Fructose, Hibiscus Sabdariffa Flower Extract, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Maltodextrin, Polyacrylate Crosspolymer-6, Polylysine, Sodium Hydroxide, Sorbitan Isostearate, Syringa Vulgaris (Lilac) Extract, Tocopherol, Trifolium Pratense (Clover) Flower Extract, Withania Somnifera Root Extract, Phenoxyethanol, Potassium Sorbate.Morning Rays: Water (Aqua), Glycerin, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Butylene Glycol, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Acetyl Tetrapeptide-5, Anhydroxylitol, Camellia Sinensis Seed Oil, Cetearyl Glucoside, Cetearyl Olivate, Curcuma Longa (Turmeric) Root Extract, Ethylhexylglycerin, Fraxinus Excelsior Bark Extract, Glycolic Acid, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Niacinamide, Resveratrol, Silanetriol, Sodium Hydroxide, Sorbitan Isostearate, Sorbitan Olivate, Tocopherol, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Xylitol, Xylitylglucoside, Phenoxyethanol.
how_to_use: AM and PM, apply 1-2 pumps of Fresh Start or Soft Launch to wet skin. Rinse off and pat dry. Follow with 1 pump of Water Slide and allow to absorb for one minute. Next, evenly apply 1-2 pumps of Slam Dunk or Cloud Surf. Finish by gently tapping 1-2 pumps of Morning Rays on the undereye area (and top it all off with a Bubble SPF if it's your morning routine).

reviews.headline: Teeny tiny!
reviews.comments: Perfect sample sizes to try the products before you buy full size, but that's exactly what they are tiny samples. My daughter (11) requested it and they were gone after maybe two or three uses.  Better for someone more disciplined in skincare products.

reviews.headline: so cute and perfect!
reviews.comments: this lil bag has the perfect selection of products! they're also soooooi cute lol. i have very little experience with skincare and i've been wanting to have a lil bit of a glow up‚Ä¶..this did the trick! i will def be buying the full sizes of these products!!

reviews.headline: Amazing when first trying scincare
reviews.comments: This was an amazing purchase. It helped me decide what to buy in full size. And it came in a cutesy little bag. I did find that its hard to pump the product and the water slide serum ran out with me only using it for a couple days. But I would definitely recommend this.

reviews.headline: I would buy it again and again
reviews.comments: My best friend loved it i gave it to her for Christmas to try and LOVES IT

reviews.headline: Good products
reviews.comments: They work well and are so cute! I'll definitely get the bigger size!

reviews.headline: Bad
reviews.comments: Do not

reviews.headline: I would buy this
reviews.comments: It was really great but for someone who just started using skincare it might be confusing for which order or how to apply them

reviews.headline: Best starter kit
reviews.comments: I got this and now I have to buy the full size of everything. It's a good way to sample everything an everything is SO GOOD.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product over and over
reviews.comments: I finally got my hands on this set. I'm so obsessed with it. I love how you can just test out the products first since it's travel size. The packaging was adorable and eye-catching. I just love this brand so much.

reviews.headline: Loved it
reviews.comments: My granddaughter loved it dor her birthday.

reviews.headline: This is perfection
reviews.comments: This is the best purchase ever, there is a lot of quality for this price! I'm in love i swear

reviews.headline: Tried these products for my sensitive skin
reviews.comments: Would buy again and again and again! I started getting the full sizes of these products and my skin isn't breaking out or anything like it's done with other skincare products I've tried in the past.

reviews.headline: yes
reviews.comments: i did not buy it yet but i have it already. it is so good. i  would get it

reviews.headline: First time using this product and I liked it!
reviews.comments: First time trying Bubbles so that is why I purchased the trail kit. I loved all of the products in this line! The face wash is really nice and gentle and the moisturizers work really well! It's even gentle enough for my 9 year old daughter to use!

reviews.headline: Bubble is life to my skin!!!
reviews.comments: Ever since I started using bubble my skin is very clear and smooth I love the hydration I have se dio skin so I live the variety and that everything is plant based I'm so in love !!!

reviews.headline: LOVE
reviews.comments: Amazing set to try a new routine without the fear of commitment!!

reviews.headline: Review
reviews.comments: I love most of bubbles products and this is a grear way to find out which products work best for your skin type

reviews.headline: Obsessed with this kit!
reviews.comments: I absolutely love the Super Cuties Kit! The packaging is adorable, and the products inside are perfect for my skincare routine. Each item feels gentle yet effective, leaving my skin soft and hydrated. My favorite slam Dunk hydrating moisturizer it works so well! I also love that the ingredients are clean and skin-friendly. Definitely a must-have, and I'll be repurchasing!

reviews.headline: Amazing
reviews.comments: These products are amazing to have when your traveling or just want to start your skin care journey and dont really know if you like it or not!!!

media.headline: Bubble is life to my skin!!!
The best essential for your spring break packing!!
media.caption: Spring Break Around The Corner!! Skin Is Glowing!! ‚ú®

media.headline: such a good bundle, would definitely buy again

faceoff_positive.comments:
I recently got my hands on the Bubble Super Cuties Mini Set, and I'm obsessed! This set is perfect for testing out Bubble's bestsellers without committing to full-size products. It includes a cleanser, toner, moisturizer, and more‚Äîall in travel-friendly packaging.

What I Loved:
‚úî Perfect for Travel ‚Äì The mini sizes fit easily in my bag.
‚úî Gentle Yet Effective ‚Äì My skin felt clean, refreshed, and hydrated without irritation.
‚úî Adorable Packaging ‚Äì The design is fun and aesthetic!
‚úî Great for Beginners ‚Äì If you're new to skincare, this set is a great way to start.

Final Thoughts:
If you want to try Bubble without buying full-size products, this set is a great option. It's affordable, effective, and perfect for all skin types. I'll definitely be repurchasing my favorites in full size!

‚≠ê Rating: 5/5
faceoff_positive.headline: Honest review

faceoff_negative.comments: The packaging is adorable and eye-catching, staying true to Bubble's fun, youthful branding. Each product is neatly arranged in the kit, making it feel like a well-thought-out set rather than just a collection of minis.
faceoff_negative.headline: Such an amazing product ‚ù§Ô∏è
